title: Steve McQueen on ‘Widows’ and Reinventing the Heist Movie | Interview (Ep. 100)
description:
Academy Award–winning director Steve McQueen stops by to discuss his new film, the Viola Davis–starring heist drama ‘Widows.’
Host: Sean Fennessey
